sentence.Network_en: An orthopedist specializes in diagnosis and treatment of deformities and injuries to bones.
sentence.Network_cn: 专长于诊断并治疗骨骼畸形和伤害.

means.word_mean: 1. a specialist in correcting deformities of the skeletal system (especially in children)

auth_sentence.content: Or read in the waiting room at the orthopedist's.
auth_sentence.res_content: Or read in the waiting room at the orthopedist's.

auth_sentence.content: I was offered Celebrex by an orthopedist, but instead, I opted to simply have pain in my feet and not get too wound up about it.
